lumi-reaction1.speaker: Takara
lumi-reaction1.text: Lumi...@ that name drips too softly.@ I've seen her light flicker in the deep before.@ She likes to swim too close to things that don't belong to her.

lumi-reaction2.speaker: Takara
lumi-reaction2.text: Kindness?@ Maybe.@ Or maybe she's pretending to be kind to see how your glow tastes.@ Some lights only shine so they can lure others closer.

lumi-reaction2.speaker: Takara
lumi-reaction2.text: Don't worry.@ I'll make sure her little lamp stops wandering into our currents.

lumi-jealous1.speaker: Takara
lumi-jealous1.text: Jealous?@ Hm...@ maybe I am.@ It's strange—@ how hearing her name makes my pulse swim faster.@ I don't like that feeling.@ I'll need to do something about it.

lumi-leaves.speaker: Takara
lumi-leaves.text: Just stay here.@ I'll take care of it.@ I always take care of what's ours.

lumi-leaves.speaker: System
lumi-leaves.text: [Takara slips away into the murk. You can't see her, but the water feels heavier. A faint pulse echoes once... then silence.]

lumi-leaves.speaker: Takara
lumi-leaves.text: There.@ All settled.@ The deep is a little quieter now, don't you think?

lumi-calm1.speaker: Takara
lumi-calm1.text: Fast?@ No.@ Just efficient.@ Problems like that don't take long if you know where to squeeze.

lumi-press1.speaker: Takara
lumi-press1.text: You don't need to think about it.@ The water took care of what needed taking care of.@ Some lights were never meant to last long down here.

lumi-press2.speaker: Takara
lumi-press2.text: I didn't mean to scare you.@ I only wanted to make sure you're safe.@ That's all I ever want.

lumi-final1.speaker: Takara
lumi-final1.text: If you really want to know...@ let's just say she won't be floating near you anymore.@ Her light's gone out.@ That's all that matters.

options.text: You… did something to her, didn't you?

lumi-deny.speaker: Takara
lumi-deny.text: 'Did something' is such a sharp phrase.@ I prefer to think of it as... removing noise from the current.@ Now, it's peaceful again.@ You can focus on me.

lumi-end.speaker: Takara
lumi-end.text: Don't drift too far anymore, alright?@ It's dangerous out there.@ But here—@ with me—@ nothing will ever hurt you again.

lumi-greeting.speaker: Takara
lumi-greeting.text: It's so nice to see you again human. I could smell you approaching.

options.text: What did you do to Lumi?!?
Lumi is gone!!! Now I only have Lion-chan
